text: Ashley Maria Roberts (born September 14, 1981) is an American dancer, showgirl, model, actress, and television personality, best known as a former member of the modern burlesque group the Pussycat Dolls. She left the Pussycat Dolls in 2010, to pursue a solo career in acting. == References == == Related pages == *Pussycat Dolls Category:American dancers Category:Models from Phoenix, Arizona Category:American movie actors Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:The Pussycat Dolls members Category:American television personalities Category:Actors from Phoenix, Arizona
title: Ashley Roberts
